body: Oh, that's how they passed from the Z4 to the AMG
The fuck is that advanced autism down below?

Its interesting how despite how depraved this manga and his creator are they somehow managed to portray a woman who despite her well-based insecurities still has the courage to dump a garbage male ruler at the end.

The little human-looking roach here wants his mucuses to be highly respected and all swallowed up by a an entity that he recognizes as strikingly beautiful, this being part of a degradation that she highly enjoys somehow.  Next the  roach who created this manga, doujinshi or whatever claims to be a fan of her, Hatsune Miku. How about porn where men swallow women menstruation "juices" and blood clots? A bloody stuff spread all over your repulsive faces. You should enjoy it as much as women in porn/hentai enjoy being urinated. I must be really damn original since I don't see this feature anywhere.

How is it that you guys who create and/or enjoy this garbage don't realize how deep your depravity and self-degradation has reached? Please heal your hatred and fear of women and sex and wipe yourselves off from this poor world.
